metadata.title: CVE-2023-4781 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1873.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-athena - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-gtk - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-gui-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-nox - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-runtime - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
vim-tiny - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
xxd - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.20').
